dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: This is our conceptual design meeting .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: <vocalsound> I'll just take a few minutes and uh go through the previous minutes .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: Um then each of you will have your presentation ,
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: um and then we will need to make a decision on the concept for the remote control .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: And then we'll have uh forty minutes for finishing up .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: <vocalsound> I'll go through the mee through the minutes first .
dialogueacts.label: off

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: Um , we just refreshed our our uh goal of making the finest remote control available .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: <vocalsound> Um we decided that , or we know that we need to use company colours , company logo .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: our Marketing Expert uh gave us some i uh information from interviews with a hundred different remote users .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: Um with some statistics that backed basically what we were thinking before .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: People thought their remotes were ugly , um
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: Um they only use uh a finite amount of buttons .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: Um and that they often lose the <disfmarker>
dialogueacts.label: stl

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: it's easy to lose a remote .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: Um which were all things we were thinking we would <disfmarker> wanna make it simple . Um <disfmarker>
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: <vocalsound> And uh some sort of locator .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: Either a button or tracking device . Um <disfmarker>
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: And that it should look different than what's out there .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: Kind of mixed mixed response on the speech recognition .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: The younger people said they wanted it , older people did not .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: Um uh I think we decided that um the expense was not necessarily worth it ,
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: and that it was probably a gimmick , that um would increasingly wear on the consumers' nerves . Um <vocalsound> <disfmarker>
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: Then the User Interface Designer um explored some of the technical functions of the remote .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: Um the simple versus the um the complex .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: The simple one being better for a user , the complex better for an engineer . Um <disfmarker>
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: Um and some personal preferences that were found in that would be that it should be a user-oriented remote , something simple .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: Um and that we didn't wanna go with a universal remote , because uh increasing cost and increasing complexity .
dialogueacts.label: el.inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: Um we would just have a T_V_ remote .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: Um and that we should also focus on the appearance of the remote .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: Have it s be something that looks different .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: And finally our um Industrial Designer uh gave us a rundown of how the remote will work .

dialogueacts.text: Um from energy source , um uh what we would use .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: Batteries because we don't wanna have a a cable . Um <disfmarker>

dialogueacts.speaker: A

dialogueacts.speaker: A

dialogueacts.text: I was given a brief executive summary , and then an update on some recent fashion trends that we might like to look at .

dialogueacts.text: And then I'll just tell you some personal preferences that I got from that .

dialogueacts.speaker: D
dialogueacts.text: Um okay the most important finding was that the fancy look-and-feel seems to be twice as important to the users as the current functional look-and-feel design ,
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: D
dialogueacts.text: which I think we've kind of already discussed before .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: D
dialogueacts.text: Um the second most important finding was that the remote should be technologically innovative .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: D
dialogueacts.text: And again these are all things we've kind of already come up with on our own , but this just backs it up .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: D
dialogueacts.text: And thirdly the remote would be easy to use .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.text: As far as fashion update , we've learned that fruits and vegetables will be the most important theme for cloths , shoes and furniture .

dialogueacts.text: So that might be a bit of a challenge to incorporate this into our remote ,
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: D
dialogueacts.text: Um and also , as opposed to last year , this year the material is expected to be spongy in feel .
